Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Monroe
ShortDescription: SB 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle and Madison, due to street blockage near Clark/Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Washington, LaSalle and Madison, due to street blockage near Clark/Monroe.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Kedzie
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to a mechanical problem on the train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Kedzie due to a mechanical problem on the train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
